sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 把这两张照片做个对比。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bǎ zhè liǎng zhāng zhàopiàn zuò gè duìbǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Faites une comparaison entre ces deux photos.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Make a comparison between these two photos.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhǐshì wǒ de cāicè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce n'est qu'une supposition de ma part.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is just my guess.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 自从毕业以来，我们没见过面。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zìcóng bìyè yǐlái, wǒmen méi jiànguò miàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Depuis que nous avons obtenu notre diplôme, nous ne nous sommes pas vus.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Since graduation, we haven't seen each other.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他从小就学习中国武术。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā cóngxiǎo jiù xuéxí Zhōngguó wǔshù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il apprend les arts martiaux chinois depuis son enfance.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has been learning Chinese martial arts since childhood.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bǐsài fēicháng jīliè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La compétition est très intense.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The competition is very intense.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yīlù shàng wǒmen liáo le hěn duō.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous avons beaucoup discuté tout au long du chemin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We talked a lot along the way.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bié zháoliáng le, duō chuān diǎn yīfu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne prends pas froid, mets plus de vêtements.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't catch a cold, put on more clothes.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ dōngxi zhuāng jìn xiāngzi lǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez mettre les affaires dans la boîte.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please put the things in the box.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 要是明天下雨，我们就不去了。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yàoshi míngtiān xiàyǔ, wǒmen jiù bù qù le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: S'il pleut demain, nous n'irons pas.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: If it rains tomorrow, we won't go.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā hěn zhùzhòng jiànkāng yǐnshí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il accorde beaucoup d'importance à une alimentation saine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He pays great attention to healthy eating.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个项目需要三个月才能完成。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège xiàngmù xūyào sān gè yuè cái néng wánchéng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce projet nécessite trois mois pour être achevé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This project needs three months to be completed.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我已经预订了一间双人房。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ yǐjīng yùdìng le yī jiān shuāngrénfáng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai déjà réservé une chambre double.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I have already reserved a double room.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tàiyáng cóng dōngfāng shēngqǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le soleil se lève à l'est.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The sun rises in the east.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他因为迟到受到了处分。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yīnwèi chídào shòudào le chǔfèn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a été sanctionné pour son retard.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He was punished for being late.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng chūshì nín de zhèngjiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez présenter vos papiers d'identité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please show your ID documents.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Běifāngrén xǐhuan chī mántou.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les gens du Nord aiment manger des pains vapeur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: People from the North like to eat steamed buns.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zuò juédìng shí bùyào tài chōngdòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne sois pas trop impulsif quand tu prends des décisions.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't be too impulsive when making decisions.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shèngxia de cài qǐng bāng wǒ dǎbāo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez emballer les restes pour moi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please pack the leftover food for me.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 空调可以调节室内温度。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Kōngtiáo kěyǐ tiáojié shìnèi wēndù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La climatisation peut réguler la température intérieure.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Air conditioning can regulate indoor temperature.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这次失败对他是很大的打击。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè cì shībài duì tā shì hěn dà de dǎjī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cet échec a été un coup dur pour lui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This failure was a big blow to him.
